transcript: I've got a five million person audience in 24 months I looked at the actions we took to try and reverse engineer why did it happen so quickly I believe I boiled it down to what I call the content unit so content unit is the single most basic piece of content so a jingle a single image a tweet is in itself a Content unit that is doing short form content and long form content is simply how many content units you stream together and a Content unit has three parts hook gets them interested retain keeps them interested and then reward rewards them for their time and attention and encourages them to come back because ideally you want your audience to watch everything you have all the way through and then have a reason to come back for the next one
